page.title: 15Whiteparish common-continued
page.content: The Purple Emperor butterfly lives on Whieparish common It has got spotted wings of white.It is one of the largest British butterflies, and it is a rare type.Sometimes the wing span can be from 3 ins.Butterflies get their refreshments from flowers or ripe fruits but the Emperor butterfly does not do this.It goes into the woods and drinks from a muddy pool.You would think this is very dirty but they also settle on dead rabbits.The female Purple Emperor lays her eggs on one leaf at a time.The caterpillar, after feeding until early October, goes into hibernation.It often chooses a place on a sallow twig and remains there throughout the winter without any protection, but it also hibernates in a dead leaf,and when this happens the caterpillar fastens the stem of the leaf to the twig by a thread.
